Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite Walkthrough

Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite is a subquest for Find a Cure.

In the Underdark, Myconid Colony, look for Blurg (X:100 Y:-89), speak to him and Omeluum, a mind flayer, will come into the conversation as well asking if you would like to get your parasite removed. This will give you the following dialogue options.

Yes. Absolutely. A mind flayer?! Die. An illithid is your friend? How is that possible? Sorry, Omeluum.
